SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.POSTERIMAGE, b.title, b.counsel_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(b.COUNSEL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') - TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS d_day FROM CP_GROUP_RESERVATION a JOIN CP_GROUP_COUNSEL b ON b.ID = a.GROUP_COUNSEL_ID WHERE a.STUDENT_PK = #{student_pk} AND b.COUNSEL_DATE > SYSDATE ORDER BY b.COUNSEL_DATE )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 3

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM cp_notice ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 4

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM cp_student_freeboard ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cp_notice_comment WHERE notice_id = #{notice_id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.student_pk, a.counselor_id, a.type_category_id, a.counsel_hour, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(a.counsel_year) || '.' || TO_CHAR(a.counsel_month) || '.' || TO_CHAR(a.counsel_date), 'YYYY.MM.DD'), 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS counsel_date, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(a.counsel_year) || '.' || TO_CHAR(a.counsel_month) || '.' || TO_CHAR(a.counsel_date), 'YYYY.MM.DD') - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD'), 'YYYY.MM.DD')) AS d_day, a.state FROM cp_offline_reservation a WHERE STUDENT_PK = #{student_pk} AND state='신청' ORDER BY COUNSEL_YEAR, COUNSEL_MONTH, COUNSEL_DATE, COUNSEL_HOUR )
WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
SELECT * FROM CP_COUNSELOR cc WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM CP_TYPE_CATEGORY ctc WHERE id = #{id}
